name: Moto Rider Vs Police Heli Cops
name_original: Moto Rider Vs Police Heli Cops
description: Are you ready for the challenging adventure race against police helicopter with these super fast motorcycles. Chase heli and control the balance of your bikes and reach the finish line without crashing. It is time to show your skills. In this bike stunt game you should to winning race against police heli and reach finish line without any collision wit obstacle. So lets start race with tricky bike stunts and make champion.
